amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds by the Department of Defense to enlist DACA youth in the United States military.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 114-623 to ensure no funds are used by the Department of Defense to enlist DACA youth in the United States military.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 214 (Roll no. 318).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 214 (Roll no. 318).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. King (IA).
